text: Mystery Train is a 1989 Japanese American comedy movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and starring Masatoshi Nagase, Youki Kudoh, Screamin' Jay Hawkins, Cinqu√© Lee, Rufus Thomas, Steve Buscemi, Tom Waits, Vonda Shepard, Joe Strummer, Sy Richardson, Elizabeth Bracco. It was distributed by Orion Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Jarmusch
title: Mystery Train (movie)
